RelatedSentence: The risk premium is rising again in oil helping it stay bid against a backdrop of a weaker dollar .

The weaker dollar is also helping gold that is perking up on expectations that the new Indian government will lift its import restrictions as well as a new EU pact that will reduce their gold - sales .

ABC reported that a senior United Nations official says the crisis in Ukraine is edging towards the point of no return .

UN assistant secretary general for human rights Ivan Simonovic says the crisis has worrying echoes of the 1990 s war in his native Croatia .

Speaking to the BBC from the eastern city of Donetsk , Mr. Simonovic said the chances of preventing full - scale civil war were diminishing .
Violence between the two sides has left dozens of people dead in recent weeks , ahead of elections for a new Ukrainian president due on May 25 .
